title: Sequeira
body: This family name comes from Lopo Vaz de Sequeira, who had sesmaria lands in Lomçado da Ribeira Brava and was married to Leonor Gonçalves do Pó.

Ribeira Brava: Locality where Lopo Vaz de Sequeira had sesmaria lands.

Lopo Vaz de Sequeira: Person associated with the family name.
